lines: at 3m, we discover and innovate in nearly every industry to help solve problems around the world.

3m scotchcast 2131 flame retardant, flexible polyurethane resin meets cenelec hd631.1 s2 requirements and is compliant with eu directive 2002/95/ec (rohs) and eu directive 1907/2007/ec (reach), guaranteeing the highest grade of electrical insulation for professional application.
the brands listed above are trademarks of 3m.

3m scotchcast 2131 rohs compliant flame retardant, flexible polyurethane premium polyurethane resin bag is suitable for use as electrical insulation and mechanical protection of flexible electrical cables for application up to 1kv.
useful for replacing or repairing the jacket on both single- and multi-core power cables

3m scotchcast 2131 rohs compliant flame retardant, flexible polyurethane premium polyurethane resin bag is suitable for use as electrical insulation and mechanical protection of flexible electrical cables for application up to 1kv
has 17-minute gel time at 73 degrees f (23 degrees c)
